xxl.core.util
Interface DistanceTo<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the object whose distance related to this object can be determined.
All Known Subinterfaces:
Point
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPoint, DoublePoint, FixedPoint, FloatPoint, NumberPoint
public interface DistanceTo<T>

An interface for determining the distance between two objects (see also Comparable <--> Comparator).

See Also:
Distance

Method Summary
 double distanceTo(T object)
          Computes the distance between this object and the given object.
